00008 namespace Dune {

00010 
00011

00013 //**********************************************************************
00014 //
00015 // --FoamGridLevelIterator
00019 template<int codim, PartitionIteratorType pitype, class GridImp>
00020 class FoamGridLevelIterator :
00021     public Dune::FoamGridEntityPointer <codim,GridImp>
00022 {
00023     enum {dim      = GridImp::dimension};
00024     enum {dimworld = GridImp::dimensionworld};
00025 
00026     public:
00027         
00029     explicit FoamGridLevelIterator(const typename std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<dim-codim,dimworld> >::const_iterator& it)
00030             : FoamGridEntityPointer<codim,GridImp>(it),
00031               levelIterator_(it)
00032         {
00033             this->virtualEntity_.setToTarget(&(*levelIterator_));
00034         }
00035         
00037         void increment() {
00038             ++levelIterator_;
00039             this->virtualEntity_.setToTarget(&(*levelIterator_));
00040         }
00041         
00042         
00043     private:
00044     
00045     // This iterator derives from FoamGridEntityPointer, and that base class stores the value
00046     // of the iterator, i.e. the 'pointer' to the entity.  However, that pointer can not be
00047     // set to its successor in the level std::list, not even by magic.  Therefore we keep the
00048     // same information redundantly in this iterator, which can be incremented.
00049     typename std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<dim-codim,dimworld> >::const_iterator levelIterator_;
00050         
00051 };
00052 
00053 
00054 }  // namespace Dune
00055   
00056 #endif
